title: Hindujas' acquisition of Reliance Capital hits financing hurdle
description: "IndusInd International Holdings (IIHL) is trying to reduce the cost by nearly one percentage point and is seeking a cheaper loan through ongoing discussions with the lenders," one of the sources said. "The loan arrangement must be finalised before May 27, as IndusInd International Holdings needs to close the Reliance Capital deal by then," the person added.
